public class MCODEMainPanelAction
extends Object
implements ActionListener

Action to display the main panel where scope is chosen and scoring and finding parameters are modified

setOpened

public void setOpened(boolean opened)
Allows the MCODE plugin to limit the number of open instances of the MCODEMainPanel to 1. If the plugin is being closed, then it sets the visual style to default if the MCODE visual style was last used.
